short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly search selected text on Cambridge Dictionary with a convenient tooltip.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Word On Cambridge makes it easier than ever to look up words on Cambridge Dictionary with a convenient tooltip. Just select text on any webpage, and the tooltip will appear, allowing you to quickly search for definitions. You can now customize where the search opens (in a new tab or popup) and choose the tooltip design (text only, logo only, or logo and text). Enhance your browsing experience with this efficient and customizable tool!
